notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: P.H., T.B., A.M., J.G., A.B. and C.R. undertook the AMIP5/CMIP5 model analyses. S.J., R.A., C.L., J.E., M.M. and D.B. provided observational heat flux estimates and/or associated guidance. P.H., K.W., J.E., D.C., J.M., P.F., K.F., C.S., S.H., J.R., L.T., H.H., R.W., S.B. contributed to the process evaluation and developments to HadGEM3. P.H., R.A., J.G., R.W., J.E., H.H., J.M., K.W., A.B., P.F., A.M., T.B., S.J., M.M., D.B. contributed to the manuscript.
